item.title: Player wont hit npc 317
item.dc:creator: @N3wc0d3r N3wc0d3r
item.description:
@N3wc0d3r wrote:

Team_Rocket:

Where’s the rest of it?

It’s part of the CombatHandler.java
Im assuming you don’t want the whole file but these are the parts that relate to the npc.

public boolean attackNPC() {
if (type == 619) {
	if (c.playerLevel[8] <= 99
		|| (c.playerLevel[11] <= 99)) {
		resetNpcAttack();
		resetAttack();
		c.resetPos();
		c.sM("You dont have enough experience to kill this boss!");
		return false;
	} else if ((c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] >= 8016)
		|| (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] <= 1274)) {
		resetNpcAttack();
		resetAttack();
		c.resetPos();
		c.sM("You cannot hurt the boss with that wep.");
		return false;
	}
}
//This part works, but i added it since it's the only other piece of code that relates to this certain npc.
if (type == 619) {
	if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[619].HP <= 120) {
		if (!c.playerHasItem(1929)) {
			resetNpcAttack();
			c.sM("It is enraged! Dowse it with water!");
			return false;
		} else {
			c.startAnimation(449);
			c.sM("You dowse it with water!");
			Server.npcHandler.npcs[619].IsDead = true;
		}
	}
}

If anyone could help, id be very grateful.

Read full topic

item.title: Player wont hit npc 317
item.dc:creator: @N3wc0d3r N3wc0d3r
item.description:
@N3wc0d3r wrote:

[Delta]

For some reason, with this code, the player is unable to attack the npc. At all. I want the npc to be able to be attacked with only a certain weapon(s). Heres my code:

if (type == 619) {
	if (c.playerLevel[8] <= 99
		|| (c.playerLevel[11] <= 99)) {
		resetNpcAttack();
		resetAttack();
		c.resetPos();
		c.sM("You dont have enough experience to kill this boss");
		return false;
	} else if ((c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] >= 8016)
		|| (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] <= 1274)) {
		resetNpcAttack();
		resetAttack();
		c.resetPos();
		c.sM("You cannot hurt the boss with that wep.");
		return false;
	}
}

It also didn’t work with this either. im looking specificlay at the equipping item part.

if (type == 619) {
	if (c.playerLevel[8] <= 99
		|| (c.playerLevel[11] <= 99)) {
		resetNpcAttack();
		resetAttack();
		c.resetPos();
		c.sM("You dont have enough experience to kill this boss");
		return false;
	} else if ((c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] != 1359
		|| (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] != 6739
		|| (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] != 8015
		|| (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] != 1275))))) {
		resetNpcAttack();
		resetAttack();
		c.resetPos();
		c.sM("You cannot hurt the boss with that wep.");
		return false;
	}
}
